channel.title: Client doesnt load RSCA
channel.description:
Client doesnt load.. on RSCA its something with wrong pathfile I tried fixing or sumfin like that... [code] C:\Users\Admin\client_src_svn\build\org\rscangel\client>"C:/program files/jav a/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/java.exe" -cp client.jar org.rscangel.client.mudclient Unable to create configuration file! item.title: Client doesnt load RSCA
item.dc:creator: @RSCHawk_Owner RSCHawk Owner
item.description:
@RSCHawk_Owner wrote:

kryptix i dont think its that…
when i dled snoopys version of rsca it said that but client ran fine.

i dont think it can find the path to where the .rscd are hence

[code]C:\Users\Admin.rsca\NPCs.rscd (The system cannot find the path specified)

)

ed)

C:\Users\Admin.rsca\Prayers.rscd (The system cannot find the path specified)

C:\Users\Admin.rsca\Doors.rscd (The system cannot find the path specified)
C:\Users\Admin.rsca\Elevation.rscd (The system cannot find the path specifie
d)
C:\Users\Admin.rsca\Objects.rscd (The system cannot find the path specified)

Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.rscangel.client.d.a.load(Unknown Source)
at org.rscangel.client.mudclient.day(Unknown Source)
